author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
Andrew Joseph White has long proved himself to be an unapologetically bold, unflinching,  and provocative author with his young adult works (all of which are absolute favourites for me), but nothing could have prepared me for what he had in store in his adult queer horror debut You Weren’t Meant to Be Human. This is […]

The post REVIEW: You Weren’t Meant to Be Human by Andrew Joseph White appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: You Weren’t Meant to Be Human by Andrew Joseph White
